fields.headline: Best offers
fields.bodyText: Under £200 Devon: In midweek throughout January, one night's B&B at the Home Farm Hotel in Honiton (0870 6085531, discoverdevon.com) costs £65 per room. Holland: Until February 6, Cresta Holidays (0870 3333303, crestaholidays.co.uk) has two nights' B&B at the AMS Holland Hotel in Amsterdam for £155pp, including Gatwick flights. Essex: In January, Pride of Britain Hotels (0870 6093012, prideofbritainhotels.com) has one night's half-board at Maison Talbooth near Dedham for £115pp, including unlimited champagne. Cyprus: Departing January 7, seven nights' half-board at the Luca Poseidonia in Larnaca costs from £195pp with Sky Holidays (0871 2224010, skyhols.com), including Luton flights. Under £600 Egypt: Between January 10 and February 28, ebookers.com (0870 8146024) has two nights' B&B at the four-star Oasis Hotel in Cairo from £255pp, including Gatwick flights. London: Throughout January, a studio apartment at 51 Kensington Court (020-7937 2030, kensingtoncourt.co.uk) costs a total of £343 for a family of four, including tickets for the London Eye. US: Between January 5 and March 16, America Direct (0870 8890827, americadirect.co.uk) is offering three nights' at the Southgate Tower Suite Hotel, New York, for £359pp (saving £93), including Heathrow flights. Turkey: For departures before February 15, Holidays 4U (0870 4442840, h4u.co.uk) has 14 nights' B&B at the four-star Club Xanthos Hotel in Kalkan from £379pp, including Gatwick flights. Goa: Departing January 20, Jewel in the Crown Holidays (01293 533338, jewelholidays.com) has 14 nights' B&B at the Abalone Hotel in Baga for £439pp (saving £110), including Manchester flights. Austria/Hungary: Until the end of March, Austria Travel (01708 222000, austriatravel.co.uk) has a seven-night two-centre break from £499pp, including B&B in Vienna and Budapest, rail transfer and Heathrow flights. Tunisia: Between January 5 and February 10, Wigmore Holidays (020-7836 4999, aspectsoftunisia.co.uk) has seven nights' B&B at the four-star Hasdrubal Hotel in Port El Kantaoui for £499pp, including Gatwick flights. Under £1,000 France: Departing January 15, Equity Ski (08704 992992, equityski.co.uk) has seven nights' half-board at the Hotel Vallon Fleuri in Les Arcs for £629pp, including Gatwick flights, lift pass, tuition, ski hire and insurance. Hawaii: Until March 17, Travelmood (08700 664556, travelmood.com) has seven nights at the three-star Radisson Prince Kuhio Hotel in Waikiki Beach from £699pp, including Heathrow flights. Brazil: Until February 28, Travelbag (0870 8146544, travelbag.co.uk>) has five nights' B&B at the South American Copacabana Hotel in Rio de Janeiro from £709pp, including Heathrow flights, transfers and tours of Sugar Loaf mountain and Corcovada. Australia: Between January 6 and March 31, Austravel (0870 1662070, austravel.com) has 10 nights at the three-star Cairns Colonial Club from £899pp (saving £271), including Heathrow flights. Dubai: Between January 8 and February 11, BA Holidays (0870 243 3406, ba.com/holidays) has five nights' half-board at the five-star One&Only Royal Mirage from £983pp, including Gatwick flights and private transfers. Over £1,000 Cambodia: Departing January 18, Gecko Travel (023-9225 8859, geckotravel.com) has a 10-day tour of Cambodia for £1,120pp (saving £125), with visits to Phnom Penh, Siem Reap and Angkor Wat. Package includes accommodation, most meals, activities, transport and flights.
